titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 175th anniversary of the birth of Mark Twain.
A resolution commemorating the 175th anniversary of the birth of Mark Twain.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Commemorates the 175th anniversary of the birth of Mark Twain on November 30, 2010, and his enduring legacy as one our nation's greatest authors and humorists.
